item.description:
Have you ever been to a Murder Mystery Party?  Well it's one party you don't want to miss out on. This Murder Mystery game is not a board game; everyone will be participating at the same time.  Some requirements are that you must not be afraid of the dark and, second, you must dress all in black clothing!  This is not a show that you just stand back and watch--you will be actively participating.

I have received permission to have this party in an historic and active Fraternity House on the UNH campus in Durham, NH.  If you ever wanted to party in a Fraternity House now is your chance!  The Fraternity name is Sigma Alpha Epsilon (SAE).  They have two huge rooms and some other interconnecting rooms that we can use.  If you're lucky you might even see a Fraternity brother there!

We will be having a potluck before the game so bring something special to eat.  We will meet at 6 pm to socialize at which time I will explain the game and give a brief tour of the house.  Then at 7pm the mystery will start.  This is not a children's event so please do not bring your children.

Please park behind the house or in front of the building. The building is an all-brick building with two concrete lions guarding the house.  The driveway is between the SAE Fraternity and another brick Fraternity building to the right of it on Madbury Road.  Do not go up the one-way street on the left of SAE.

I anticipate we will have a fairly large amount of people coming so I will be limiting the number of people for this event to a total of 40.  I will be combining this event with other meetup groups.

Please RSVP "Yes" only if you are willing to actively participate.  This is not a spectator event.  Also, be aware that this event is played in nearly dark rooms.  Please dress in comfortable (and BLACK) clothing as you might be dying on the floor!

 

More details will follow as we get closer to the event.

$10 at the door the night of the event.

If you have any questions call me at 603-312-6735 or 603-868-1346.

See you there for a memorable night!

Peter
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the guy in the black cape.
item.why: It's a blast and it's a great way to meet others!

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Murder Mystery Party
